H0.text: In which city is Slum Dog Millionaire set. Delhi

H1.text: In which city is Slum Dog Millionaire set. Kolkata

H2.text: In which city is Slum Dog Millionaire set. Chennai

H3.text: In which city is Slum Dog Millionaire set. Mubai

A4.text: Slumdog Millionaire narrates the story of 18-year-old Jamal Malik from the Juhu slums of Mumbai.

A5.text: Slumdog Millionaire was shot entirely in Mumbai and has garnered 8 Oscar awards.
